articles.description: PRINCE GEORGE and Princess Charlotte normally attend Thomas's school in Battersea, West London, but have been learning from home amid the coronavirus pandemic. Is this the reason George and Charlotte will not be homeschooled next week?

articles.title: College bribery scandal: Lori Loughlin and husband plead guilty in court - The Guardian
articles.description: Loughlin and Mossimo Giannulli hope to spend two and five months in prison but judge says he has not decided whether he will accept plea deals
articles.content: Full House star Lori Loughlin and her fashion designer husband, Mossimo Giannulli, pleaded guilty on Friday to paying $500,000 to get their two daughters into the University of Southern California as… [+2383 chars]

articles.title: JK Rowling reveals Harry Potter's true birthplace: Clapham Junction - Sky News
articles.description: Turns out "the boy who lived" was born in a flat above 94 St John's Road in south west London. Bad luck Edinburgh.
